  • Classes in equipments.AirConditioning used by equipments.AirConditioning
    Class
    Description
    AirConditioning.AirConditioningSensorMeasures
     
    AirConditioning.AirConditioningState
    The enumeration AirConditioningState describes the operation states of the AirConditioning.
    AirConditioningController.ControlMode
     
    AirConditioningInternalControlI
    The interface AirConditioningInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the air conditioning to its thermostat controller.
    AirConditioningPushImplementationI
     
    AirConditioningSensorDataCI.AirConditioningSensorCI
     
    AirConditioningUserAndControlI
    The interface AirConditioningUserAndControlI declares the signatures of the methods corresponding both to actions performed by users and by the controllers on the air conditioning.
    AirConditioningUserAndExternalControlI
    The interface AirConditioningUserAndExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible both to the user and to the external controller.
    AirConditioningUserImplI
    The interface AirConditioningUserImplI declares the signature of the methods corresponding to actions performed by users on the air conditioning: switching on and off, setting the target temperature, etc.
  • Classes in equipments.AirConditioning used by equipments.AirConditioning.connections
    Class
    Description
    AirConditioningActuatorCI
     
    AirConditioningExternalControlCI
    The component interface HeaterExternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the household energy manager to adjust the power consumption of the heater.
    AirConditioningInternalControlCI
    The component interface HeaterInternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the thermostat to control the heating by the heater.
    AirConditioningInternalControlI
    The interface AirConditioningInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the air conditioning to its thermostat controller.
    AirConditioningSensorDataCI.AirConditioningSensorCI
     
    AirConditioningSensorDataCI.AirConditioningSensorOfferedPullCI
    The interface AirConditioningSensorOfferedPullCI is the pull interface that a server component must offer to be called the inbound port.
    AirConditioningSensorDataCI.AirConditioningSensorRequiredPullCI
    The interface AirConditioningSensorRequiredPullCI is the pull interface that a client component must require to call the outbound port.
    AirConditioningUserAndControlI
    The interface AirConditioningUserAndControlI declares the signatures of the methods corresponding both to actions performed by users and by the controllers on the air conditioning.
    AirConditioningUserAndExternalControlI
    The interface AirConditioningUserAndExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible both to the user and to the external controller.
    AirConditioningUserCI
    The component interface AirConditioningUserCI declares the signature of the services offered and that can be required by the user from the air conditioning.
    AirConditioningUserImplI
    The interface AirConditioningUserImplI declares the signature of the methods corresponding to actions performed by users on the air conditioning: switching on and off, setting the target temperature, etc.
